ComicInfo.Title: Altamont; The Day J.F.K. Bought the Farm; The Way We Wore; I Was a Teenage Mets Fan; They Said It Couldn't Be Done; Massage Muddle; '69; Highschool in Limboland; Communal Life. . . .; Dial M For Monster; Chicago '68; Nowhere to Run; Introducing Randy Peters; Pocked Lips Now
